article.description: Adrian Rodgers scored 20 points and Southern cruised past NAIA member Dillard 79-65 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Southern cruises past NAIA Dillard 79-65
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. -- Adrian Rodgers scored 20 points and Southern cruised past NAIA member Dillard 79-65 on Tuesday night. Rodgers made four 3-pointers on 11 attempts, was perfect on six free throws, and added five rebounds. Trelun Banks had 19 points on 6-of-11 shooting, Shawn Prudhomme chipped in 18 points and Chris Thomas had 12 points and eight boards. The Jaguars (3-1) were 10 of 30 from beyond the arc. Demetric Austin led Dillard with 20 points and 14 rebounds. Montrey Thomas added 12 points and Dillard outrebounded Southern 48-37. Dillard hung in early, but Rodgers' 3-pointer midway through the first put Southern up by six. Prudhomme's 3-pointer with 1:56 left in the first provided a 12-point cushion and Southern led 39-30 at intermission. Dillard got as close as six in the second half, but the Bleu Devils were outmatched down the stretch.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
